TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBindableTemplate implements class System.Web.UI.ITemplate

summary.span: 提供一種方法給 以及 之類的 ASP.NET 資料繫結控制項，讓它們能夠自動繫結到樣板化內容區段內的 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項。

span.span: Provides a way for ASP.NET data-bound controls, such as and , to automatically bind to an ASP.NET data source control within templated content sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面提供了 ASP.NET 資料繫結控制項，例如， ，和，以繫結至資料提供 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項，例如或，當資料繫結控制項包含樣板化內容。The interface provides a way for ASP.NET data-bound controls, such as , , and , to bind to data supplied by an ASP.NET data source control, such as or , when the data-bound control includes templated content. > [!NOTE] > 網頁程式開發人員不會實作介面。Page developers do not implement the interface. 建立自訂的資料繫結控制項的開發人員可能會操作的實作中的物件並方法，但不是會實作自己物件。Developers creating custom data-bound controls might manipulate objects in implementations of the and methods, but do not implement their own objects. 資料繫結控制項，例如通常會留意其子控制項樹狀結構中，可以因此值繫結至這些、 擷取它們的值和資料繫結控制項和資料來源控制項之間傳遞這些值，每當發生資料繫結.Data-bound controls such as typically are aware of their child control trees, and can therefore bind values to them, extract values from them, and pass these values between the data-bound control and a data source control whenever data binding occurs. 不過，當頁面開發人員定義的資料繫結控制項的樣板化內容時，範本內的子控制項不會顯示在父資料繫結控制項： 父代可呈現子系內容 （因為控制項會有效地將自己轉譯），但它無法擷取這些子控制項，以傳遞至相關聯的資料來源控制項的更新、 插入或刪除作業的值。However, when a page developer defines templated content for a data-bound control, the child controls within the template are not visible to the parent data-bound control: the parent can render the child content (because controls effectively render themselves), but it cannot extract the values of these child controls to pass to an associated data source control's update, insert, or delete operation. 在資料繫結案例中，樣板化內容是在父資料繫結控制項的不透明的。In data-binding scenarios, templated content is opaque to a parent data-bound control. `Bind`語法可讓資料繫結控制項內的資料繫結的控制項擷取值執行個體。The `Bind` syntax makes it possible for the data-bound control to extract the values from a control data-bound inside an instance. 資料繫結可以是單向或雙向。The data binding can be one-way or two-way. (這些繫結方向由定義列舉型別。)單向資料繫結為輸出方向，從資料來源控制項資料繫結控制項中執行的任何資料繫結例如，任何資料讀取案例牽涉到單向資料繫結。(These binding directions are defined by the enumeration.) One-way data binding is any data binding performed in an outbound direction, from data source control to data-bound control; for example, any data-reading scenario involves one-way data binding. 單向資料繫結，您可以使用單向資料繫結語法 (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) 在樣板化內容，而且不需要使用雙向 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法。For one-way data binding, you can use one-way data binding syntax (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) inside templated content, and do not need to use two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax. 雙向資料繫結描述輸入的方向，從資料來源控制項資料繫結控制項中的資料繫結。Two-way data-binding describes data-binding in the inbound direction, from the data-bound control to the data source control. 自動編輯、 插入和刪除案例使用 ASP.NET 資料繫結和資料來源控制項是雙向資料繫結案例。Automatic edit, insert, and delete scenarios using ASP.NET data-bound and data source controls are two-way data-binding scenarios. 這些案例使用雙向資料繫結運算式 (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`)。These scenarios use two-way data-binding expressions (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`). 介面及 ASP.NET 基礎結構支援 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項和樣板化內容之間的自動、 宣告式的雙向資料繫結。The interface and the ASP.NET infrastructure support automatic, declarative, two-way data binding between ASP.NET data source controls and templated content. 如需有關 ASP.NET 資料繫結運算式和語法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 繫結至資料庫](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)並[資料繫結運算式概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information about ASP.NET data-binding expressions and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 資料繫結控制項的樣板化內容最常以宣告方式定義。Templated content for data-bound controls is most often defined declaratively. 下表描述最常使用樣板化的資料繫結至資料繫結控制項的程序。The following table describes the processes most commonly used to bind templated data to data-bound controls. |資料繫結控制項Data-bound control|處理序Process| |-------------------------|-------------| ||資料繫結控制項繫結至資料使用`DataSourceID`資料來源控制項，與樣板化內容屬性定義於，或屬性。The data-bound control is bound to data using the `DataSourceID` property of the data source control, and the templated content is defined in an , or property.| ||資料繫結控制項繫結至資料使用`DataSourceID`資料來源控制項，與樣板化內容屬性定義於或屬性。The data-bound control is bound to data using the `DataSourceID` property of the data source control, and the templated content is defined in an or property. 控制項不支援插入作業。The control does not support an insert operation.| ||資料繫結控制項繫結至資料使用`DataSourceID`中定義屬性和樣板化內容， ，或屬性，或在物件。The data-bound control is bound to data using the `DataSourceID` property, and the templated content is defined in an , , or property, or in a object.| 和控制項不支援自動的雙向資料繫結案例。The and controls do not support automatic two-way data-binding scenarios. ASP.NET 會隱含地建立物件繫結至 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項範本內的樣板化內容剖析時。ASP.NET implicitly creates an object when templated content that binds to an ASP.NET data source control within the template is parsed. 具體來說，ASP.NET 剖析器建立的執行個體類別時，它會剖析 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法，其中包含支援資料繫結的 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項的樣板化內容。Specifically, the ASP.NET parser creates an instance of the class when it parses templated content that uses ASP.NET data-binding syntax and contains ASP.NET Web server controls that support data binding. 這些 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項標記的屬性。These ASP.NET sever controls are marked by the attribute. 介面會定義一個方法， 。The interface defines one method, . 這個方法定義雙向資料繫結，以便在資料繫結控制項可自動擷取樣板化內容中的名稱/值組，並傳遞給資料來源控制項在執行階段。This method is defined for two-way data binding, so that a data-bound control can automatically extract name/value pairs from templated content and pass the pairs to a data source control at run time. 自動資料繫結成功，請從樣板化內容中擷取的欄位名稱方法必須符合在相關聯的資料來源控制項中的參數名稱。For automatic data binding to succeed, the field names extracted from the templated content by the method must match parameter names in an associated data source control. 控制開發人員呼叫方法明確地只在實作內或其他類似的自訂資料繫結控制項的方法。Control developers call the method explicitly only within their implementations of or some other similar method of a custom data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項以宣告方式定義樣板化內容、 繫結至所提供的資料控制項，並顯示並編輯現有的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how a control can declaratively define templated content, bind to data provided by a control, and display and edit existing records. ASP.NET 剖析器剖析樣板化內容，並建立物件在執行階段能夠將值從繫結控制項範本中定義這兩個單向的 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法所繫結的資料區域 (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) 和雙向資料繫結語法 (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`)。The ASP.NET parser parses the templated content and creates an object at run time that is able to bind values from the control to the data-binding areas defined in the template by both one-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) and two-way data-binding syntax (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個控制項具有接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅的文字方塊。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormView/CS/formvieweditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormView/VB/formvieweditvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary ExtractValues(class System.Web.UI.Control container) cil managed
Public Function ExtractValues (container As Control) As IOrderedDictionary

param.name: container
param.span: 可從中取出名稱/值組的 。在雙向的資料繫結狀況下，資料繫結控制項會將這些名稱/值組傳遞給相關的資料來源控制項。

span.span: The from which to extract name/value pairs, which are passed by the data-bound control to an associated data source control in two-way data-binding scenarios.

summary.span: 此方法若由某個類別實作出來時，會將樣板化內容中以雙向 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法繫結的值取出，組成一連串的名稱/值組。

span.span: When implemented by a class, retrieves a set of name/value pairs for values bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax within the templated content.

returns.span: 名稱代表樣板化內容中控制項的名稱，值則是以雙向 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法繫結之屬性目前的值。

span.span: The name represents the name of a control within templated content, and the value is the current value of a property value bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax.

para.span: 方法必須符合下列規則：

span.span: An method must conform to the following rules:

para.span: -如果多個繫結存在指定的欄位，會使用最後一個遇到的繫結。

span.span: - If more than one binding exists for a given field, the last binding encountered is used.

para.span: -若要參考中的控制項的識別項方法，該控制項也必須有使用者定義的 ID 屬性是在剖析階段。

span.span: - In order to reference a control's identifier in the method, the control must also have a user-defined ID property at parse time.

para.span: 如果沒有 ID，這會導致剖析錯誤。

span.span: If no ID exists, this results in a parse error.

para.span: -雙向 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法繫結只適用於在或資料繫結控制項的屬性。

span.span: - Two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax is only valid in an or property of a data-bound control.
